books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.description: Inikeza izinto ezinhle futhi izigaba ezikhathalelwe ezingeni lokuphakama

books.title: Clean Code
books.description: Isombisa uhlelo olusha lwezokusebenza futhi ukuthuthukisa ukwazi okuphelele ukuthola ukwazi okuphelele

books.title: Outwitting the Devil
books.description: Umphakathi onganikeli ubuqu lokushiyana ngo-Napoleon Hill ukuphatha uNarasa kuwo wonke amandla, usokhomba amagciwane akusebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa njalo nenhlanhla ekuphatheni kwabantu

books.title: The Kybalion
books.description: Le ncwadi enomhlamvu itholakala ngokwe-hermeticism, indlela evamile yokuthi ivuleke kule minyaka ephakathi

button.title: Izinto ezinhle ezithandwa
button.description: I-project ye-time capsule, okuyinto ibhalwe ngempela ngo-Rocketseat, ngiphumelela ukwakha le project kusukela ngonyaka kuya ngoonyaka.

about.title: Ngicela ngingubani?
about.description: Ngaphezu kwalokho ukuthi ngiyinxalenye yemibhalo yezakhiwo esihlalweni esingaphansi, nginemibhobho eminingi, okuyinto kungenziwa ukudlala izithameli zetshani, ukufunda izincwadi ngamabhange anezinye, ukubuka izikhathi nezintombi zakhe abazibonisa ezimbili.

quote.sentence: Omunye umuntu ongakhokhelwa ukuthola okuningi kulungile ukukhokhelwa kakhulu kwakhe.
quote.author: Napoleon Hill

projects.title: Lokos D' Bira Website
projects.description1: I-web app yayikhishwa ngamaJele ngo-tribute for band eceleni lami
projects.description2: Highlight for SEO optimizations made with NextJS, uzama ukufunda isibonelo somsebenzi we-band's name on Google

projects.title: Metallica API
projects.description1: Isenzo se-backend sesisithombe sokwakha sibonga ngo-Rock Day (July 13)
projects.description2: Ikhuthaza lokhu ngo-project yokuthi nabaqambi baphathane

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description1: Konke izi-Programmers zinelungelo lokuwakha le-project, kodwa ngilikhona konke lokuwusebenza ngo-Tailwind
projects.description2: Le project yayimoshini yekwiphi endleleni yeFull-Stack

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description1: Ngakuphazamisa ukusebenza nge-ORM eyodwa ekwaziyo, ngizelela i-Sequelize ngaphandle ko-Prisma
projects.description2: Lomsebenzi wabuye wakwenza njengoba ukuphazamisa ngo-Technical Full-Stack

projects.title: Chat GPT Clone
projects.description1: Ukudlulisela kwe-API ye-OpenAI, eyenziwe ngomumo wokuthi uChatGPT uyafunda
projects.description2: I-interface is the same as ChatGPT when it was launched.

projects.title: Movie Library
projects.description2: Uzofunda izinqubo ezithakazelisayo mayelana nemvume yakho yamafilimu afanelekayo

projects.title: NLW E-Sports
projects.description2: Umphumela ophakathi wasekuseni wathela ukugcina umsebenzi wokusebenza nge-page page yabo e-sports ne theme nayizinye
